alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN RED WILLOW COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Danbury, or 13 miles southeast of McCook, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Danbury around 555 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
